page.title: 18PLAYGROUND RHYMES
page.content: {RACING CAR {. Racing Car number nine, losing gallons all the time. How many gallons did it lose? {1p DIP {. lp dip sky blue, which one, not you. Not because you're dirty, not because your'e clean, my mum says you're the fairy queen. Ibble Obble. Ibble obble black bobble, ibble obble out. Turn the dirty dish cloth inside out. The one that lands on number ten shall surely be the one. Hopping Along. Hopping along, how many metres did you go? All Around the Garden. All around the garden, all around the lake,first one now _ a dip to take.
